text: Na'ankure zamagra zamefi hunami'za, Saidoni vahe'mofo a' havi anumza Astoretinte'ene, Moapu vahe havi anumza Kemosinte'ene, Amori vahe havi anumza Morekinte monora hunente'za, nagrira namagera nonte'za, nagri navurera knare zamavu'zmavara nosu'za, Solomoni nefa Deviti'ma hu'neaza hu'za kasegeni'ane trakeni'a ovariri'naze.
